title: Create e-commerce website for Kishan Dairy with product catalog and ordering

requirements.text: Create a homepage that displays 'Kishan Dairy' as the shop name prominently in the header
acceptanceCriteria: Shop name 'Kishan Dairy' is visible in the header on all pages
Name is clearly legible and professionally styled

requirements.text: Display a prominent notice that delivery is available only in Sitamarhi, Bihar

quotes: Product deliver in only sitamarhi, bihar

acceptanceCriteria: Delivery area information 'Delivery available only in Sitamarhi, Bihar' is visible on the homepage
Information is clearly communicated to users before they place orders

requirements.text: Create a product catalog backend that stores dairy products with fields for product name, description, price, unit (liters/kg), image reference, and availability status

quotes: Make a for my dairy products business

acceptanceCriteria: Backend can store and retrieve multiple dairy products
Each product has name, description, price, unit, image reference, and availability fields
Products can be added, updated, and listed

requirements.text: Create a product listing page that displays all available dairy products with their images, names, prices, and units

quotes: Make a for my dairy products business

acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a grid or list layout
Each product shows image, name, price, and unit
Only available products are shown to customers

requirements.text: Implement a shopping cart system where users can add dairy products, adjust quantities, and view their cart total
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart from the product listing
Cart shows selected products with quantities and subtotals
Users can increase/decrease quantities or remove items
Cart displays total price

requirements.text: Create an order placement system that collects customer name, phone number, delivery address in Sitamarhi, and stores the order with selected products

quotes: Product deliver in only sitamarhi, bihar

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout form collects customer name, phone number, and delivery address
Order is saved to backend with customer details and cart items
User receives confirmation after successful order placement
Form validates that delivery address is in Sitamarhi, Bihar

requirements.text: Design a warm, clean, and trustworthy visual theme using earthy tones (greens, creams, browns) that evokes fresh, farm-quality dairy products, with clear typography and spacious layouts that work well for a local business
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses natural, farm-inspired colors
Typography is clean and easily readable
Layout feels professional yet approachable for a local dairy business
Design is consistent across all pages

requirements.text: Render generated images for dairy products and shop branding as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images load properly on product listings and branding areas
No backend routing is used for generated images

constraints: Delivery area must be restricted to Sitamarhi, Bihar only
All backend logic must be implemented in a single Motoko actor
Frontend must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
nonGoals: Admin panel for product management in this iteration
